inn1.comm: Sri Lanka are off the mark in style, Zaheer strays on the fuller and straighter side, Tharanga gets forward closes the face and places the shot wide off mid-on, that was a firm push but the ball raced away to the fence, the outfield is super quick
short of  a length ball outside off stump, Tharanga lets it go
defended to midwicket off the front foot, Zaheer has adjusted his length to a shorter one
good length ball on off stump, Tharanga moves forward and leans into a languid drive through mid-off this time, excellent timing and there's no stopping that
defended to midwicket on the front foot
whoops, Zaheer fires that down leg side and it swings away from Dhoni who dives despairingly to his right, the ball beats him and Sri Lanka gets five wides
better length and line outside off stump, Tharanga lets it go, expensive start from Zaheer, brings back memories of the 2003 World Cup final
fullish length on Jayasuriya's pads, he turns it behind square leg for two to get off the mark
a rank half-volley outside off stump, Jayasuriya uses his powerfulbottom hand to hoist it over cover and send it screaming to the fence, Sri Lanka have come out blazing hot
short of a length and wide outside off stump, Jayasuriya flays at it but doesn't time it well
short of a length ball on off and middle, Jayasuriya gets forward and defends to square leg
good length ball on off stump, Jayasuriya gets behind the line of that one and defends with a straight bat back to the bowler
short of a length again on middle stump, Jayasuriya moves across his stumps and plays it to midwicket
hits a good length outside off stump and shapes it back into Tharanga who squares arms and lets it go through to Dhoni
pushed on the front foot to Uthappa at cover point, Jayasuriya wanted the single but Tharanga sent him back
short of  alength outside off stump, Tharanga lets it go again but this one moved a long way back after it passed the batsman
Zaheer errs on the fuller side and Tharanga lofts it over extra cover, intentionally hit and timed perfectly
Zaheer bowls this much shorter and the ball seams away from the left-hander, Tharanga fishes at it on the back foot and gets beaten
and he gets beaten again, Zaheer drew him forward with one that pitched on a good length, Tharanga drove lazily at it and the ball whizzed past the outside edge
good length and line, angling across Jayasuriya from over the wicket, he gets right behind the line and defends on the front foot
Munaf strays on to pad an Jayasuriya misses the flick, the ball hits the pad and trickles behind square, Tharanga sets off for the single but Jayasuriya wasn't in the least bit interested
defended towards cover on the front foot
just short of a length on middle and off stump, Jayasuriya gets forward and defends
good length and shaping away from Jayasuriya after pitching on middle, Jayasuriya gets forward and gets a thickish outside edge to point

Munaf drops a fraction short on leg stump again, Jayasuriya once more misses the flick and the ball hits the pad and goes to Dhoni, the Indians appeal hopefully but Taufel is unmoved, Munaf finishes a maiden over!
Zaheer drops it short and angles it into Tharanga who plays on the back foot and defends to cover
fuller length on middle and off stump, Tharanga pushes it back to Zaheer
short of a length angling into the hips, Tharanga tucks it off his pads towards square leg, Zaheer is making sure not to bowl full, that length is cannon fodder on this pitch
good length just outside off stump, Tharanga tries to force it through the off side but gets a bottom edge that goes to Dhoni on the bounce
a fraction fuller and too straight, Tharanga whips it in front of square leg for two
tight ball to end the over, just outside off stump, Tharanga gets forward and pushes to cover
defended to point on the front foot
too short and on middle and off stump, Jayasuriya gets under it and whips it with that powerful bottom hand through square leg for four, trademark Jayasuriya
short of a length angling away from Jayasuriya, he waits on the back foot and pushes it to point
and you just can't bowl short and on the pads with the fine leg in the circle, Munaf does just that, Jayasuriya moves across and tickles it fine for four more
Jayasuriya leans across his stumps to one that's pitchid on middle and off, he tucks it into the vacant square leg area for a comfortable single

he's dragged it back and the Eden Gardens erupt! That wasn't short enough to pull and Tharanga tried to force it through midwicket from outside off stump, he got a thick inside edge that cannoned into off stump
good length shaping into the off stump from outside off, Jayasuriya defends with bat close to pad
shot! Sublime use of the bottom hand, Zaheer drops it a fraction short, Jayasuriya moves across and picks it off his pads and lofts to the square leg fence
take that! Marginally short from Zaheer outside off stump, Jayasuriya latches on to the length and unleashes a fearsome cut that scorches the grass before pounding the fence
pushed into the covers for a quick single
fuller length on middle and off stump, Jayawardene gets forward and right behind the line and blocks
tight line and length on end the over, Jayawardene defends back to the bowler
short of a length on middle and off, Jayasuriya transfers weight on to his back foot and drives to cover
a touch fuller outside the off stump, Jayasuriya waits for it and cuts it very late down to third man for a single
pitches on a good length just outside Jayawardene's off stump, he moves on to the front foot and defends towards cover
Munaf has his second! Jayawardene falls to a tame shot, that was fullish on off stump, Jayawardene got under it and scooped it softly to Dravid at mid-on, catches don't come much easier than that
fullish length outside off stump, Sangakkara pushes tentatively at it on the front foot and gets an inside edge on to the pad
pitches short of  a length and shapes away from Sangakkara who lets it go through to Dhoni
Jayasuriya drives a good length ball on off stump on the up, he hits it to the man at mid-off
short of  a length angling into middle stump, cramping him for room, Jayasuriya gets on the back foot and defends
fullish length on off stump, Jayasuriya plants his front foot forward and drives to covers
good length ball on off stump, Jayasuriya gets on the back foot and defends to point
short of a length outside off stump, Jayasuriya jumps up and cuts in the air and over point, that looked very risky but he controlled that to perfection
pitches outside off stump on a good length and comes into Jayasuriya with the angle, he defends with a straight bat back to the bowler
shot, Sangakkara gets on the front foot to one thats on a good length adn shaping away from him, he opens the face at the last moment and steers it to third man
short of a length on leg stump, Jayasuriya moves across towards off stump and tries to flick, he gets hit on the pad and the ball rolls to Tendulkar at  short fine leg
good length ball on off stump, Jayasuriya tries to cut but gets a thick bottom edge to point for a single, Sri Lanka reach 50 runs in quick time
fullish length on off stump, Sangakkara leans forward and drives firmly to mid-off
short of a length and strays on to the pads as well, Sangakkara turns it down to fine leg for a single
fullish length on leg stump, Jayasuriya plays it wide of Tendulkar at short fine leg for one to end the over
he starts off with a  wide down leg side, that pitched outside leg stump and swung further away
better line, on leg and middle and angling across Jayasuriya who plays back and defends to the bowler

short and wide outside off stump, a freebie that Jayasuriya accepts with glee, he rocks back and slaps that through covers for four, it was in the air but no one even moved as the ball sped to the fence
Sreesanth errs by bowling a full ball and Jayasuriya clobbers it over mid-off for another four, Sreesanth is under pressure rightaway
tight line and length on off stump, Jayasuriya defends towards point on the back foot
airy shot from Jayasuriya, he threw his bat and a wide one and took one hand off the handle, he wasn't close to hitting that
defended to point on the front foot, Sreesanth goes for nine in his first over
good length on off stump, Sangakkara gets forward and drives gracefully to mid-off, so pleasing to watch is Sangakkara
strays down leg side, Sangakkara tries to flick but the ball clips the pad and runs down to fine leg for leg byes
good length on middle and off stump, Sangakkara gets right behind the line and blocks with a  straight bat
a fraction short on leg and middle, Sangakkara turns it off his hips to Harbhajan at square leg
short of a length on off stump, Jayasuriya plants his front foot forward and defends to the off side
that was in the air for a short while but feel well short of mid-off, the length wasn't there for Jayasuriya to play the drive and he checked his shot before any damage was done
fuller length outside off stump, 135 kmh, Sangakkara went down on one knee and aimed to cover drive, he got an inside edge to the leg side
good length outside off stump, too close to the body to cut and Sangakkara got a thick bottom edge on the off side for a single
too full outside off stump, Jayasuriya gets forward and lofts through the line over covers for another boundary
smacked hard at point on the front foot, Sreesanth is lucky to get away with that short and wide one
the edge evades Dhoni! Jayasuriya pushed hard at one that was on a good length on off stump, he got a thick edge that ran wide of Dhoni
too short on the pads, Jayasuriya tucks it behind square leg for a single to end the over
tight line and length on off and middle, not giving Jayasuryia any room, he gets forward and defends to the off side
a fraction shorter and Jayasuriya waits on the back foot and plays it to point
short of a length on middle and leg, Jayasuriya works it off his pads to short fine leg, three dot balls in a row to Jayasuriya
and the fourth goes for four! Too short and on leg stump, Jayasuriya swivels and pulls past short fine leg, he brings up his 62nd fifty with that boundary and looks good for a lot more
defended on the front foot back to the bowler, Munaf hits that tight length around off stump again
this one bounces a bit more from a good length, Jayasuriya tries to cut on the back foot but the ball is too close for the shot, he gets beaten

classic shot, Sangakkara gets forward to one that's full and wide, he frees his arms and unfurls a gorgeous cover drive, Uthappa gets a hand on it but the ball is timed so well that it still reaches the fence
defended on the front foot on the leg side
outstanding, Sreesanth drops it short and wide, Sangakkara moves forward and cuts hard and places it behind point for another four
better length and the line is on middle and off, Sangakkara pushes on the front foot to covers
short of a a length again and Sangakkara move sback and punches elegantly to point, he's in superb nick
too close to cut and Sangakkara was lucky to esacpe witha  bottom edge that rolled past his stumps
tossed up from around the stumps, bang on target, fullish length, he plonks the foot forward and defends
wrong length, short outside off stump, Jayasuriya flays at it and gets a good thick edge well wide of slip that runs away for four
better length, tossed up around off stump and he defends with bat and pad together
quicker through the air, angled in from outside off stump, defended again
slightly more air this time, looser one, he plants the leg in line of the ball and sweeps with the spin through square leg
tossed up just outside off stump again, he hustles to defend and gets an inside edge to leg, thinks about the run but Dhoni's quick to get the gloves off and hurry across
too full, in the slot to be hit, and he does, though not with full strength as he just got under it a bit, but lofts it wide of mid-on for four
short of a length just outside off stump, he's cramped for room and hops and cuts with an angled bat in front of point
good length, again that bat comes down angled but he's played with soft hands, pushing into covers and calling for the quick single

edged and gone! A pretty ordinary delivery, shortish outside off stump, but Sangakkara gets a bit too much on top of it with the square cut, and a lack of real footwork, and edges to Dhoni, who takes a very easy chance
good ball, full and moving in from outside off stump, and Atapattu drives neatly to mid-on
good length ball, quicker too, coming in from outside off and Atapattu gets in line and defends back to an energetic Sreesanth
flat outside off stump, he leans into and drives into the covers
tossed up outside off stump, he comes forward and defends to the  off
quicker on off stump, Atapattu shuffles to get to the pitch of it and then defends hurredly
drifts to middle and leg and he tucks it around the corner for one
around the wicket now, pushed in flatter and quicker and Jayasuriya drives to cover
tossed up again, good length, and this time he gets pad and bat together and defends back to the bowler
too full on the legs, bread and butter for Atapattu, who only has to accept this lolly and flick it backward of square for four to bring up Sri Lanka's 100

back of a length on off stump, he stands up and defends, the ball rolls to the offside and Jayasuriya scampers down the pitch only to be sent back, Sreesanth collects the ball and has a shy back down the pitch, but misses and the batsman gets home
